title: Elegant Diamond-Studded Gold Chain - A Timeless Addition to Your Jewellery Collection
materials: 22K Yellow Gold. The chain features diamond studded beads. The diamonds have brilliant cut. "Hyderabadi Polish" ensures a lasting
features: This chain blends classic gold chain with modern sophistication through the addition of round and oval-shaped beads, each meticulously set with sparkling diamonds.The diamond set beads are in sequence with two similar shape beads and then a round shape bead.
colors: Predominantly gold with a dazzling display of white diamonds.
occasions: special occasions. Also suitable for traditional events like half-saree function
description: A fusion of timeless gold and modern diamond design. Its versatility makes it a treasured addition to any jewelry box. This chain with diamond studded beads will be a gift to remember by for many years.
